name: Videographer
description:
Artec 3D develops the world’s leading 3D handheld scanners, innovative 3D data processing technology, and facial recognition systems. Our clients make the world’s best cars, aircraft, computers, consumer electronics, video games, clothing, and security systems.

Our company is made up of bright, forward-thinking, and motivated people with a sense of fun and adventure. We have offices in Moscow, Shanghai, Luxembourg, and California.

For this position, we’re looking for a video creator with industry experience in videography, video journalism, and/or content creation to make compelling tutorials, training videos, webinars, and marketing videos about Artec 3D products.

If this sounds like you, come and join us!

Primary Responsibilities:

  • Filming, motion graphics, editing, color grading

Required skills:

  • Able to create a complete video from scratch (from research to post-production)
  • Extensive knowledge of the Adobe CC Suite, specifically After Effects and Premiere or other similar professional editing software
  • Experience with Blender/Maya/C4d/3ds max/Unreal engine are a plus
  • Ability to work efficiently both in a team and solo
  • Good communication skills, both written and verbal
  • Working knowledge of English

Recommended

  • Experience in color grading, sound editing, and/or photograph
  • Lighting and rendering in 3D software

Culture and benefits

  • Warm, friendly atmosphere (online and offline!)
  • Medical insurance
  • Central Moscow location with a modern, spacious office (WFH also possible)
